meanings.sent1: She is reanalysing the data to find any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reanalysing my favorite books to discover new meanings.
meanings.sent3: The detective kept reanalysing the evidence until he found the missing clue.
meanings.sent4: By reanalysing the situation, she was able to come up with a creative solution.
meanings.sent5: Reanalysing the experiment results led to a breakthrough discovery.

meanings.sent1: He is reanalysing his decision to see if it was the right choice.
meanings.sent2: We should always reanalysing our goals to ensure they still align with our values.
meanings.sent3: The student kept reanalysing the test questions to make sure he didn't miss anything.
meanings.sent4: Reanalysing the budget helped them find areas where they could save money.
meanings.sent5: She is reanalysing her schedule to make time for her hobbies.
